query:
UPDATE plans SET price_yearly = CASE 
  WHEN slug = 'basico' THEN 93120
  WHEN slug = 'profissional' THEN 189120
  WHEN slug = 'empresarial' THEN 381120
  ELSE price_yearly
END
WHERE slug IN ('basico', 'profissional', 'empresarial');
